\/D:\/repos\/stride-translations\/pt-BR\: Stride gives you total control over the graphics pipeline state.
Stride dá-lhe total control sobre o estado do pipeline gráfico.
Stride gives you total control over the graphics pipeline state.
State is compiled into immutable @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineState' objects, which describe the whole pipeline.
Estado é compilado em objetos @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineState' imutáveis, que descrevem todo o pipeline.
State is compiled into immutable @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineState' objects, which describe the whole pipeline.
They are then bound using a @'Stride.Graphics.CommandList'.
Eles são então ligados usando um @'Stride.Graphics.CommandList'.
They are then bound using a @'Stride.Graphics.CommandList'.
// Criando objeto de estado de pipeline
// Applying the state to the pipeline
// Applying the state to the pipeline
The @'Stride.Graphics.MutablePipelineState' class let you set states independently, while caching the underlying pipeline states.
O @'Stride.Graphics.MutablePipelineState' classe deixá-lo definir estados independentemente, enquanto caching o pipeline subjacente estados.
The @'Stride.Graphics.MutablePipelineState' class let you set states independently, while caching the underlying pipeline states.

The rasterizer can be set using the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.RasterizerState' property.
O rasterizer pode ser definido usando a propriedade @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.RasterizerState'.
The rasterizer can be set using the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.RasterizerState' property.
A set of predefined descriptions is held by the @'Stride.Graphics.RasterizerStates' class.
Um conjunto de descrições predefinidas é realizada pela classe @'Stride.Graphics.RasterizerStates.
A set of predefined descriptions is held by the @'Stride.Graphics.RasterizerStates' class.
They deal with the cull mode, and should be enough for most use cases:
Eles lidam com o modo de chamada, e devem ser suficientes para a maioria dos casos de uso:
They deal with the cull mode, and should be enough for most use cases:
<g1> Código:</g1> Definir o modo de chamada
You can create your own custom state.
Você pode criar seu próprio estado personalizado.
You can create your own custom state.
For the list of options and default values, see the @'Stride.Graphics.RasterizerStateDescription' API documentation.
Para a lista de opções e valores padrão, consulte a documentação da API @'Stride.Graphics.RasterizerStateDescription.
For the list of options and default values, see the @'Stride.Graphics.RasterizerStateDescription' API documentation.
var rasterizer Descrição do Estado = nova RasterizerStateDescription(CullMode.Front);
rasterizerStateDescription.ScissorTestEnable = true; // permite o teste de tesoura
The @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.DepthStencilState' property contains the depth and stencil states.
A propriedade @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.DepthStencilState contém a profundidade e os estados estencil.
The @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.DepthStencilState' property contains the depth and stencil states.
A set of commonly used states is defined by the @'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStates' class:
Um conjunto de estados comumente usados é definido pela classe @'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStates:
A set of commonly used states is defined by the @'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStates' class:
@'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStates.Default': depth read and write with a less-than comparison
@'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStates.Default': profundidade ler e escrever com uma comparação menos do que
@'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStates.Default': depth read and write with a less-than comparison
@'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStates.DefaultInverse': read and write with a greater-or-equals comparison
@'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStates.DefaultInverse': leia e escreva com uma comparação maior ou igual
@'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStates.DefaultInverse': read and write with a greater-or-equals comparison
@'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStates.DepthRead': read only with a less-than comparison
@'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStates.DepthRead': leia apenas com uma comparação menos do que
@'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStates.DepthRead': read only with a less-than comparison
<g1> Código:</g1> Definindo o estado de profundidade
You can also set custom depth and stencil states.
Você também pode definir a profundidade personalizada e estados estêncil.
You can also set custom depth and stencil states.
For the  list of options and default values, see the @'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStateDescription' API documentation.
Para a lista de opções e valores padrão, consulte a documentação API do @'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStateDescription.
For the  list of options and default values, see the @'Stride.Graphics.DepthStencilStateDescription' API documentation.

The stencil reference isn't part of the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineState'.
A referência do estêncil não faz parte do @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineState'.
The stencil reference isn't part of the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineState'.

The @'Stride.Graphics.BlendStates' class defines a set of commonly used blend states:
A classe @'Stride.Graphics.BlendStates define um conjunto de estados de mistura comumente usados:
The @'Stride.Graphics.BlendStates' class defines a set of commonly used blend states:
@'Stride.Graphics.BlendStates.AlphaBlend': sums the colors using the alpha of the source on the destination color
@'Stride.Graphics.BlendStates.AlphaBlend': resume as cores usando o alfa da fonte na cor de destino
@'Stride.Graphics.BlendStates.AlphaBlend': sums the colors using the alpha of the source on the destination color
@'Stride.Graphics.BlendStates.NonPremultiplied': sums using the alpha of the source on both colors
@'Stride.Graphics.BlendStates.NonPremultiplied': somas usando o alfa da fonte em ambas as cores
@'Stride.Graphics.BlendStates.NonPremultiplied': sums using the alpha of the source on both colors

You can set custom depth and blend states.
Você pode definir estados de profundidade e mistura personalizados.

Para obter uma lista de opções e valores padrão, consulte a documentação da API @'Stride.Graphics.BlendStateDescription.

The blend factor isn't part of the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineState'.

The pipeline state also includes the shaders you want to use for drawing.
O estado do pipeline também inclui os shaders que você deseja usar para desenhar.
The pipeline state also includes the shaders you want to use for drawing.
To bind an @'Stride.Graphics.Effect' to the pipeline, set the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.EffectBytecode'
Ligar uma @'Stride.Graphics. Efeito para o pipeline, definir o @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.EffectBytecode '
To bind an @'Stride.Graphics.Effect' to the pipeline, set the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.EffectBytecode'
and @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.RootSignature' properties of the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription' to the matching values of the effect.
e @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.RootSignature' propriedades do @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription' aos valores correspondentes do efeito.
and @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.RootSignature' properties of the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription' to the matching values of the effect.
An @'Stride.Shaders.EffectBytecode' contains the actual shader programs.
Um @'Stride.Shaders.EffectBytecode' contém os programas de shader reais.
An @'Stride.Shaders.EffectBytecode' contains the actual shader programs.
For more information, see <g1>Effects and Shaders</g1>.
Para mais informações, consulte <g1>Efeitos e Shaders</g1>.
For more information, see <g1>Effects and Shaders</g1>.
The @'Stride.Graphics.RootSignature' describes the number and kind of resources expected by the effect.
A @'Stride.Graphics.RootSignature' descreve o número e tipo de assets esperados pelo efeito.
The @'Stride.Graphics.RootSignature' describes the number and kind of resources expected by the effect.
The next chapter covers how to <g1>bind resources</g1> to the pipeline.
O capítulo seguinte abrange como <g1> recursos combinados</g1> para o pipeline.
The next chapter covers how to <g1>bind resources</g1> to the pipeline.

The pipeline state describes the layout in which vertices are sent to the device through the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.InputElements' and @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.PrimitiveType' properties.

O estado do pipeline descreve o layout em que os vértices são enviados para o dispositivo através do @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.InputElements' e @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.PrimitiveType' propriedades.

The pipeline state describes the layout in which vertices are sent to the device through the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.InputElements' and @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.PrimitiveType' properties.
The <g1>Draw vertices</g1> page describes how to create custom vertex buffers and their @'Stride.Graphics.VertexDeclaration' in more detail.
A página <g1>Draw vertices</g1> descreve como criar buffers de vértice personalizados e seus @'Stride.Graphics.VertexDeclaration' em mais detalhes.
The <g1>Draw vertices</g1> page describes how to create custom vertex buffers and their @'Stride.Graphics.VertexDeclaration' in more detail.
<g1> Código:</g1> Definir um layout de entrada
The @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.Output' property of the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription' defines the number and @'Stride.Graphics.PixelFormat' of all bound render textures.

A propriedade @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.Output' da propriedade @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription' define o número e @'Stride.Graphics.PixelFormat' de todas as texturas de renderização limitadas.
The @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription.Output' property of the @'Stride.Graphics.PipelineStateDescription' defines the number and @'Stride.Graphics.PixelFormat' of all bound render textures.
For information on how to bind render textures to the pipeline, see <g1>Textures and render textures</g1>.
Para obter informações sobre como ligar texturas de renderização ao pipeline, consulte <g1>Texturas e renderizar texturas</g1>.
For information on how to bind render textures to the pipeline, see <g1>Textures and render textures</g1>.
<g1> Código:</g1> Criar uma descrição de saída
renderização Descrição da saída = nova RenderOutputDescription (GraphicsDevice.Presenter.BackBuffer.Format, GraphicsDevice.Presenter.DepthStencilBuffer.Format);
You can use the @'Stride.Graphics.RenderOutputDescription.CaptureState(Stride.Graphics.CommandList)' to retrieve the output description last set on a @'Stride.Graphics.CommandList'.
Você pode usar o @'Stride.Graphics.RenderOutputDescription.CaptureState (Stride.Graphics.CommandList)' para recuperar a descrição de saída último conjunto em um @'Stride.Graphics.CommandList'.
You can use the @'Stride.Graphics.RenderOutputDescription.CaptureState(Stride.Graphics.CommandList)' to retrieve the output description last set on a @'Stride.Graphics.CommandList'.
This is especially useful in combination with @'Stride.Graphics.MutablePipelineState', when the render target might not be known up front.
Isso é especialmente útil em combinação com @'Stride.Graphics.MutablePipelineState', quando o alvo de renderização pode não ser conhecido na frente.
This is especially useful in combination with @'Stride.Graphics.MutablePipelineState', when the render target might not be known up front.
